Activity: Arrive at office, review final preparations for the EHR vendor meeting. Double-check all documentation and talking points.
Finalize questions for the EHR vendor, focusing on development options, cost estimates, and potential integration challenges. Prepare backup questions.

Meeting with @ehrv-1 (EHR Vendor Liaison) to discuss the feasibility of implementing the required updates or modifications and obtain cost estimates and timelines for development and implementation. Record meeting minutes and key decisions.
Lunch Break. Reflect on the morning's meeting.
Document the key takeaways from the meeting with the EHR vendor, including cost estimates, timelines, and any identified risks or limitations.

Share the meeting summary with @itpm-1 (IT Project Manager) and @clinlead-1 (Clinical Lead) to obtain their feedback and approval on the proposed approach. @PEOPLE: itpm-1, clinlead-1; Topic: EHR Vendor Meeting Summary and Next Steps
Begin evaluating different integration options based on the information gathered from the EHR vendor. Website Browsing: Research different integration frameworks.
Update the technical specification document with the latest information from the EHR vendor. Identify potential risks and mitigation strategies.
Check emails and prepare a summary of the day's accomplishments.
